Audio Description: At the top of this black and white poster are the words “Your Ration Board”, in large black letters. Beneath the words is a framed photograph of five men and one woman seated around a wooden table covered with papers. The woman is seated at the left end of the table, writing on paper, as if taking notes. To her left, a man is standing at the corner of the table holding papers in his left hand. He appears to be speaking to the group. The other four men are seated around the table listening. On the lower right corner of the picture is a small white square with the words “ Typical war price and rationing board, Toledo, Ohio”. On the bottom center of the frame, is a white square with the words “Democracy in action”. At the bottom of the poster, in large black letters are the words “These folks are our neighbors….help them help you!”
Creator: United States. Office of Price Administration
